snippet: Two gunmen on a motorcycle killed a man as he drove near Tel Aviv's bustling beachfront on Saturday, in what Israeli police suspected was the latest in a wave of gangland murders and attacks....

headline.print_headline: Man Gunned Down as Gangland Crime Wave Rocks Israel
headline.main: Man Gunned Down as Gangland Crime Wave Rocks Israel

lead_paragraph: Two gunmen on a motorcycle killed a man as he drove near Tel Aviv's bustling beachfront on Saturday, in what Israeli police suspected was the latest in a wave of gangland murders and attacks.
